Episode.Overview: Hosted by Amir Arison, “Behind The Blacklist: Season II” is a fun peek behind the curtain of this international television hit, presented through entertaining interviews with cast and creators sharing their “insider” stories, and exciting clip packages that feature everything fans love about THE BLACKLIST -- incredible action, colorful villains, evolving characters, unpredictable storylines, and edge-of-your-seat suspense. The special will conclude with the world-premiere of an eye popping :90 trailer, which will exclusively utilize new footage.
